title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Ridgeland, Mississippi
body: Ranger-Led Activities and Events in the Ridgeland Area         Rangers help visitors learn about the animals of the Natchez Trace Parkway. NPS Photo  You may chose to join a park ranger and explore parts of the original Trace, or learn more about the many American Indian mounds found along route of the modern Parkway. Discover the world of boatmen and bandits, Chickasaw and Choctaw, and forest and wildlife. Ranger programs are always free; schedules and topics vary by season. Please call 1-800-305-7417 for more information on ranger-led activities.
